description:
A New Standard for Image Viewers

BandiView is the succeeding image viewer to Honeyview, that inherits everything cool of its predecessor and also gets improved even further. Fast and easy to view images in a variety of formats, from the most common ones to the most professional ones.
- Added an option to the image converter to save an image as HDR AVIF (when the original is an HDR image)
- Fixed a bug that the app fails to show some TIFF files correctly
- Improved the app to be able to open truncated WebP files
- Fixed a bug that the app does not process the ICC profile of an AVIF file
- Fixed a bug that the app shows some NEF files incorrectly
- Fixed a bug that the app cannot open some JXR files
- Added a feature that zooms on an image to its center if the image is larger than the window
- Fixed a bug that the app cannot open some Ultra HDR images
- Fixed a bug that the app cannot show the aperture settings of RAW files
- Improved arrangements for collation and both-sided printing
- Fixed an issue that the app window flickers when started in the dark mode
- Added an option to hide the app's logo on a blank screen
- Improved the processing of an image's alpha channel
- Added a feature that shows a separate RGB channel of an image
- Improved the image converter to disable the screensaver while the converter is running
- Fixed a bug that playback of some animated images is slow
- Other modifications
